General.Name: Robertet SA
General.Description: Robertet SA produces and sells perfumes, aromas, and natural products. The company operates in four segments: Raw materials, Fragrances, Flavors, and Active Ingredients. It also produces organic essential oils and active ingredients. The company operates in North America, Europe, the Asia Pacific, South America, Caribbean, Africa, and the Middle East. Robertet SA was founded in 1850 and is headquartered in Grasse, France.

0.Name: Mr. Christophe  Maubert
0.Title: Head of the Perfumery Division, Director of Fragrance Division & Director
